mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.num AS "num", a.num2 AS "num2", a.str AS "str", a.email AS "email", a.url AS "url", a.new_date AS "newDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_validation( id, num, num2, str, email, url, new_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{num}, #{num2}, #{str}, #{email}, #{url}, #{newDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE test_validation SET num = #{num}, num2 = #{num2}, str = #{str}, email = #{email}, url = #{url}, new_date = #{newDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
